description:
Showers Pass designed these waterproof breathable pants for the most demanding cycle tourers and commuters. Reflective from all angles, with high quality zippers, thigh vents and a reinforced seat that will stand up to countless long days in the saddle, they'll be your shelter on stormy city streets and windswept passes alike.

  • Made with Showers Pass' highest-performing 3-layer waterproof breathable construction
  • Fully seam taped for reliable waterproofness
  • Partial elastic waist with zip fly and snap button closure
  • Suspender compatible
  • Durable reinforced seat stands up to long days in the saddle, and is perforated for enhanced breathability
  • High quality YKK Aquaguard Vislon water-resistant zippers used throughout
  • Thigh vents prevent overheating
  • Thigh pocket is accessible while riding
  • Articulated knees for riding comfort
  • Ankle zips for easy on and off over shoes
  • Integrated cinch straps keep pants legs away from chain
  • Extensive reflective detailing for excellent visibility
  • As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Refuge Waterproof Pants - Men's
